Package pacman

Class Summary
AudioManager Handles the loading and playing of sound effects and background music.
GameManager Initializes the required objects and runs the game.
GameObject A base object used in the game.
GameObjects Contains any objects or data that may be required by many separate objects.
GameScreen The Game Screen which handles all the drawing of the game.
GraphicsManager Pre-loads and stores all necessary sprites and backgrounds of the game.
Link Represents the character that the player controls.
Main Contains the main method to start the Link to the PacMan game.
Rupee Represents a rupee that is in the room for the player to collect.
Stalfos An object representing the enemies in the game.
Wall Represents the solid walls preventing the player from leaving the room.
 

Enum Summary
Direction Specifies the different directions that link and stalfos' can be moving.
